Browse the source code of codebrowser/gtsam/3rdparty/cephes/cephes/yv.c

1/*
2 * Cephes Math Library Release 2.8: June, 2000
3 * Copyright 1984, 1987, 2000 by Stephen L. Moshier
4 */
5
6#include "mconf.h"
7
8extern double MACHEP;
9
10
11/*
12 * Bessel function of noninteger order
13 */
14double yv(double v, double x)
15{
16 double y, t;
17 int n;
18
19 n = v;
20 if (n == v) {
21 y = yn(n, x);
22 return (y);
23 }
24 else if (v == floor(x: v)) {
25 /* Zero in denominator. */
26 sf_error(func_name: "yv", code: SF_ERROR_DOMAIN, NULL);
27 return NAN;
28 }
29
30 t = M_PI * v;
31 y = (cos(x: t) * jv(n: v, x) - jv(n: -v, x)) / sin(x: t);
32
33 if (cephes_isinf(y)) {
34 if (v > 0) {
35 sf_error(func_name: "yv", code: SF_ERROR_OVERFLOW, NULL);
36 return -INFINITY;
37 }
38 else if (v < -1e10) {
39 /* Whether it's +inf or -inf is numerically ill-defined. */
40 sf_error(func_name: "yv", code: SF_ERROR_DOMAIN, NULL);
41 return NAN;
42 }
43 }
44
45 return (y);
46}
47
